Class AuthenticationApi

java.lang.Object
com.amilesend.tmdb.client.api.ApiBase
com.amilesend.tmdb.client.api.AuthenticationApi
public class AuthenticationApi extends ApiBase
TMDB Authentication API.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    CreateGuestSessionResponse
    createGuestSession()
    Creates a new guest session to allow for limited access to a user's account.
    CreateRequestTokenResponse
    createRequestToken()
    Creates a new request token to validate the TMDB user login.
    CreateSessionResponse
    createSession(@NonNull CreateSessionRequest request)
    Creates a new user session that grants access to write user data.
    DeleteSessionResponse
    deleteSession(@NonNull DeleteSessionRequest request)
    Deletes a session.
    ValidateKeyResponse
    validateKey()
    Validates the application's access permissions (i.e., the read access token).

  • Method Details

    • createGuestSession

      public CreateGuestSessionResponse createGuestSession()
      Creates a new guest session to allow for limited access to a user's account. More information: https://developer.themoviedb.org/reference/authentication-create-guest-session
      Returns:
      the response containing the guest session identifier.
      See Also:
      • CreateGuestSessionResponse

    • createRequestToken

      public CreateRequestTokenResponse createRequestToken()
      Creates a new request token to validate the TMDB user login.
      Returns:
      the response containing the request token
      See Also:
      • CreateRequestTokenResponse

    • createSession

      public CreateSessionResponse createSession(@NonNull CreateSessionRequest request)
      Creates a new user session that grants access to write user data.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing the request token
      Returns:
      the response containing the secret session identifier
      See Also:
      • CreateSessionRequest
      • CreateSessionResponse

    • deleteSession

      public DeleteSessionResponse deleteSession(@NonNull DeleteSessionRequest request)
      Deletes a session.
      Parameters:
      request - the request containing the session identifier
      Returns:
      the response
      See Also:
      • DeleteSessionRequest
      • DeleteSessionResponse

    • validateKey

      public ValidateKeyResponse validateKey()
      Validates the application's access permissions (i.e., the read access token).
      Returns:
      the response
      See Also:
      • ValidateKeyResponse
